Keyboard shortcuts for Evernote

A visual cheat-sheet for the 90 keyboard shortcuts found in Evernote

Original Reference Report Issue

Application-wide

New Note

  • Ctrl
  • N

New Chat

  • Ctrl
  • Alt
  • C

Jump to notebook

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • N

  • Ctrl
  • P

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • P

  • Ctrl
  • Alt
  • A

  • F10

  • F11

Search notebook

  • Shift
  • Alt
  • N

  • Shift
  • Alt
  • T

Show Search Explanation

  • Ctrl
  • F10

Close separate windows/Minimize main window to tray

  • Alt
  • F4

Sync

  • F9

Online Help

  • F1

Rename selected notebook, note, tag, or saved search

  • F2

Set focus to the tag field of the active note

  • F3

Cycle through note list views (Snippet, Card, Top List, Side List, Thumbnail)

  • F5

Note List

  • F1

Go to previous note

  • Up

Go to next note

  • Down

Scroll note list up one page

  • PgUp

Scroll note list down one page

  • PgDown

Go to the first note in list

  • Home

Go to the last note in list

  • End

Move to Trash

  • Delete

Open the selected note in a separate window

  • Ctrl
  • Enter

Set focus in the note editor of the selected note

  • Enter

Left Panel

Move to the previous item in the section (notebooks, tags, ...)

  • Up

Move to the next item in the section (notebooks, tags, ...)

  • Down

View the list of sub-items under the selected item (if applicable)

  • Right

Collapse the list of sub-items under the selected item (if applicable)

  • Left

Delete selected item

  • Delete
